title: Enhancing CS Competencies in Practical Skills: Blended Learning-Based Advanced Communication Training for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Apply ≥5 effective communication strategies tailored to diverse patient types (age, cultural background, severity of condition)
Perform ≥3 team-based communication simulations with peer nurses and other healthcare professionals through online/offline collaboration

Within six months, learners will complete a portfolio including patient-centered communication scenarios based on three actual clinical cases and validate their communication skills by achieving an average score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) on a supervisor/mentor evaluation rubric (five criteria).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
